main: ^Hey, stop! Mr. this arena is a restricted place for normies like you. Who might you be?
^I need to talk to your boss
next: ^You think you have something to offer the circus? You're just a nobody.
^Well, let me talk with him and we find out
next2: ^Listen, buddy, the only person who matters around here is me, Bongo the Magnificent. I'm the star of the show and everyone knows it.
^If I help you, could I meet him?
next3: ^Why would I want your pathetic help?
^Ehh... Just go already. Help me with setting up the mirrors. I need this for my magnum opus. Maybe you'll talk with boss after my performance.
^And watch HOW MANY audience there is!
